title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
The response must correctly define the rule of law.

For Task A, the response must correctly define a political concept, system, institution type, process, or policy.

For Task B, the response must correctly describe two different examples of a political concept, system, institution type, process, or policy, each one within/used by a different AP Comparative Government and Politics course country.

For Task C, the response must correctly explain the implications of a similarity or difference of the political concept, system, institution type, process, or policy for each of the two AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries described in B.
descriptions: The responses accomplish none of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question. For a student to earn a point for C they must first earn the B point.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question. For a student to earn a point for C they must first earn the B point.
The response accomplishes four of the tasks set by the question. For a student to earn a point for C they must first earn the B point.
The response accomplishes five of the tasks set by the question. For a student to earn a point for C they must first earn the B point.
